name: Pizza Mafia
description:
DESCRIPTION
Defend the pizzeria from endless waves of hardened mafia criminals!
use the buttons on-screen to shoot pizzas of varying sizes towards hoards of enemies.
Defend the pizzeria for as long as you can!
try and set the record for the longest time survived!
Available for both PC and Android!

CONTROLS
use A / D to move left-to-right on PC
tilt your device left/right to move left and right on Android
Press the pizzas on screen to shoot at your enemies!

AVAILABLE PLATFORMS
- Windows 7 +, excl. Windows 11
- MacOS Sierra +
- Ubuntu, Nitrux, Zorin OS
